name: Men Against - Violence and Abuse
briefDescription: MAVA works primarily with Boys and Men in schools, colleges and communities engaging them  on gender and sexuality matters and enabling them to reach out to peers and other young men using out-of-the box methods like residential camps, street-theatre, film festival and usage of social media.In the last 10 years, around 700 youth mentors of MAVA have reached out to over 2,00,000 young men and adolescent boys in 9 districts of Maharashtra, through interactive workshops, community outreach programs, youth helpline and social media.
